name: Davie The Slapper
description:
Davie The Slapper is a 2D twin stick shooter, where instead of guns, you use BASS and the power of SLAPP to destroy your enemies.

You play as Davie504, fighting against enemies in duels or BASS BATTLES. Enemies range from instruments, like the acoustic guitars, to guitarists and bassists. Ever wanted to fight in a bass battle against the Pro Bassist or the Camera Guy? In this game, you can!

There is also the challenge game mode, where you have to fend off multiple enemies at once. Currently there are 10 challenge levels, but that might be increased in future updates.

Thank you for checking the game out! :D
